title: Patrick Roy, Avalanche players keep their cool after opening night collapse
text:
Published By: Denver Post - Today 
Avalanche coach Patrick Roy tried to stay positive Friday. A day after his team blew a three-goal, third-period lead in a 5-4 loss to the vi...
